trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Nesh Ohr has something to ask you.
TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_TODO_00<tab>Lie in wait at the designated location and defeat the father of armored dragons.
TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_NESHOHR_100_000<tab>Come closer, little one. I must ask thee─did a pitiable dragonet meet its end at thy hand?

TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_NESHOHR_100_002<tab>Though I cannot find it in my heart to thank thee, nor shall I admonish thee. The young one would have suffered every living moment...as do we all, though some torments are more easily borne.
TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_NESHOHR_100_004<tab>If thou wouldst prevent further needless suffering, pray seek my shelled kin at the shallow lake. He hath wallowed overlong in hatred beyond healing.
TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_NESHOHR_100_005<tab>Wait by the waterside, and he will find thee.
TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_NESHOHR_100_010<tab>...So it is done. I heard his dying cry.
TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_NESHOHR_100_011<tab>His bloodline was the strongest of the armored ones, possessed of carapaces like unto stone. Yet even they were not impervious to the metal fiends' onslaught.
TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_NESHOHR_100_012<tab>It took but one to raze their nest. Even now, its terrible form doth linger in my mind─the four jaws that ravened 'neath a shroud of steel...
TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_NESHOHR_100_013<tab>And to the few who escaped the carnage, life has gifted naught but despair. They yearn for vengeance, though our enemy has long since quit this place.
TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_NESHOHR_100_014<tab>As thou hast witnessed, they now turn all too quickly to indiscriminate violence... Alas, this only feedeth the fires of their guilt─never doth it quell them.
TEXT_AKTKZJ005_04341_NESHOHR_100_015<tab>Nay, I fear that only death hath that power.
